title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Today’s guest is Robert “Bob” Cavnar and he is a thirty year veteran of the oil and gas industry who has accumulated... <!--more--> years of experience in their operations and drilling activities.
He is currently the chief executive officer of Luca Technologies, an firm that researches ways to harness natural processes for producing natural gas in a sustainable manner.
He is also the former President and CEO of Milagro Exploration, a privately held oil and gas exploration corporation in Houston that focused its operations along the Gulf coasts and offshore in the Gulf of Mexico.
